features.name: Disable Cameras
features.description: Immediately disables all cameras. Ensure all guards are eliminated first, as they can detect the cameras being destroyed!

features.name: Hostage All Civilians
features.description: Immediately turns all civilians into hostages, making it highly effective for stealth heists once the police are stealthily eliminated.

features.name: Kill All Police
features.description: Instantly kills police and makes non-stealth heists a breeze.

features.name: Remove Proximity Prompt Delay
features.description: Removes all delays on proximity prompts, enabling instant interaction with any object or action.

features.name: Speed Modifier
features.description: Allows you to modify how fast you can move.

features.name: Weapon Modifications
features.description: Lets you customize your weapons, including options for infinite ammo and damage adjustments.
